name: Dream Doc
description:
This is a brand new treatment that you developed!

In Dream Doc you play as a dream therapist. Suggest the right things to think about so your patients can finally have normal sleep again!

 

Help patients by talking with them about their dreams. You need to be a doctor for this! This is difficult work! Remember the dreams exactly the way patients told them!

You'll improve many lives, But first, you'll have to listen to what they have to say though! You can only help your patients, if you remember their dreams correctly.

This game was made for BeansJam '22

Soundtrack Yän · Reverie Surgery (Dream Doc Soundtrack) Credits

Game by Nevis
Music by Yän
